description: An Earth system model of intermediate complexity.
name: EMIC Configuration
rationale: A spectrum of models of various complexity is used in modelling the natural Earth system. Depending on the nature of questions asked and the pertinent time scales, there are, on the one extreme, conceptual, more inductive models, and, on the other extreme, three-dimensional comprehensive models operating at the highest spatial and temporal resolution currently feasible. Models of intermediate complexity bridge the gap.
longName: Earth System Model of Intermediate Complexity
keywords: EMIC, Intermediate Complexity, Earth System Model
